text: alam tara ila alladhina qila lahum kuffu aydiyakum wa-aqimu l-salata waatu l-zakata falamma kutiba ʿalayhimu l-qitalu idha fariqun min'hum yakhshawna l-nasa kakhashyati l-lahi aw ashadda khashyatan waqalu rabbana lima katabta ʿalayna l-qitala lawla akhartana ila ajalin qaribin qul mataʿu l-dun'ya qalilun wal-akhiratu khayrun limani ittaqa wala tuz'lamuna fatilan
